query:
SELECT c.id, c.advisor, c.mode, COUNT(m.id) as message_count, c.last_message_at
FROM conversations c
LEFT JOIN messages m ON c.id = m.conversation_id
WHERE c.user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'test@test.com')
GROUP BY c.id, c.advisor, c.mode, c.last_message_at
ORDER BY c.last_message_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
